preqs: ECC2000 or ECC5900 or ECX9000 and ECC2010 or ECC5901 or ECX9010

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ECC2000, ECC2010, ECC5900, ECC5901} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {EC380, EC3804, EC3805E, ECC3800%, ECO3800, ECO3804}

description: The work of Richard Cantillon, David Hume, Adam Smith, David Ricardo, Thomas Malthus and Karl Marx with special reference to the economics of value, distribution and accumulation. The work of W S Jevons, Alfred Marshall and J M Keynes with special reference to economic policies proposed by those writers.
